response:
Right LMN facial weakness, ipsilateral limb/gait ataxia with gaze-evoked nystagmus, and contralateral-predominant pyramidal signs (spasticity, hyperreflexia, extensor plantars) localise to a single crossed brainstem lesion involving the right facial fascicle/nucleus, pontocerebellar connections, and corticospinal tract before decussation.

lesion_locations = ["right pontine tegmentum"]
